title: The Viktor's bug.
body:
it has a bug with Viktor's Q, sometimes if you after Q and quickly clicking or repeat clicking a object, the extra damage won't appear, seems like can't throw out the hit, the last hit just can't doing properly always stuck.
And very odd sound when after Q hitting turret, anyway i think these are such serious problem for me as Viktor lover.

replies.body:
>**DO NOT** post bug reports here. Instead, head on over to our [Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) board.

Each boards has guidelines on the lower left side of the site. This is one for Help & Support (OCE).
